about_the_game:
Step into the vibrant world of Battle Carnival - Multiplayer Fun, a fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game where you can choose from six unique characters—Timmy, Tazzy, Tuffle, Benny, Bucky, and Bogal—and compete to become the top shopkeeper in a bustling marketplace! Each match lasts few minutes, challenging players to gather the most crowds, outsmarting opponents by stealing their crowds and leveraging a variety of fun power-ups.

Objective: Attract as many crowds as possible to your shop within a limited time. Move around using a virtual joystick, collect customers to gain points, and steal crowd from other players to boost your crowd size and dominate the competition.

Game Features:

Characters: Six charming characters, each with unique personality .

Power-Ups: Use exciting power-ups like the Magnet to attract customers, Speed Boost for quick escapes, and the hot air drop to jump in different position.

VIP Customer: A rare VIP customer —catch them if you can! They spawn randomly, creating strategic opportunities to gain an edge.

Maps: Play across immersive environments like carnival and snow and new maps coming soon. Each map has entry requirements, challenging players to level up and unlock higher rewards.

Game Modes:

Online Multiplayer: Compete globally with players of similar rank.

Private Games: Host private matches with friends for extended fun!

With dynamic stages, adorable characters, and intense strategy,Battle Carnival - Multiplayer Fun is a fun, action-packed experience where only the most skilled shopkeeper wins. Jump in, attract Crowds outsmart your opponents, and claim victory in this carnival of excitement!

developers: Nilee Games and Future Technologies Pvt Ltd
name: Battle Carnival - Multiplayer Fun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10th Gen or better, AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon 680M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 11th Gen or better, AMD Ryzen 5 5600 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1080ti, AMD Radeon 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible

publishers: Nilee Games and Future Technologies Pvt Ltd
short_description: Battle Carnival - Multiplayer Fun is a fast-paced multiplayer game where you race to become the top shopkeeper. Choose from six characters, collect customers, steal crowds, and use power-ups to outsmart rivals in fun maps. Play online or host private matches for endless excitement!
